UniprotID	Q9UI42
Accession	Q9UI42;B7Z576;Q86UY9
EntryName	CBPA4_HUMAN
ProteinName	Carboxypeptidase A4 (EC 3.4.17.-) (Carboxypeptidase A3)
GeneName	CPA4 CPA3 UNQ694/PRO1339
Length	421
Function	Metalloprotease that cleaves hydrophobic C-terminal residues with a preference for -Phe, -Leu, -Ile, -Met, -Tyr and -Val (PubMed:20385563). May function in peptide hormone and/or neuropeptide catabolism (PubMed:20385563).
Subcellular Location	Secreted
